title: Glitter Red Berry and Tea Leaf Candle Ring 12" D
features: Glitter red berry and green leaf candle ring or wreath 12" D
Very dense green glittered tea leaves and clumps of red glittered berries
Use in dining room on buffet, fireplace mantel, coffee table
Could be used as a mini wreath or bowl surround
description: Glitter red berry and green leaf candle ring is 12". The center ring measures 5.5" and will easily accommodate pillar candle or hurricane. Very glitzy glitter makes this one a real attention-getter. Manufacturer suggests using non-flame candles (see label information).
